charaepi_ch0120_00_lusamine/2301_1101_01:
Tired from a training session in the forest,
[Name:PlayerNickname ] decided to return to
the village.
charaepi_ch0120_00_lusamine/2301_1101_02:
Upon arriving, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] spotted Lusamine speaking
with a scientist there.
charaepi_ch0120_00_lusamine/2301_1201_04: Oh my... You’re covered in mud!
charaepi_ch0120_00_lusamine/2301_1201_05: What happened? You aren’t hurt, are you?
charaepi_ch0120_00_lusamine/2301_0401_07:
I see. You must have been working very hard with
your partner Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0120_00_lusamine/2301_0402_09:
I see. Well, having the energy to play in the forest
is certainly a good thing.
charaepi_ch0120_00_lusamine/2301_1201_10:
But you may have overdone it a bit. Your clothes
are filthy!
charaepi_ch0120_00_lusamine/2301_1101_11:
Lusamine dusted off [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s
clothes and wiped the mud off [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] face.
charaepi_ch0120_00_lusamine/2301_1201_13:
Lillie and Gladion used to come home covered in
dirt and mud all the time, too.
charaepi_ch0120_00_lusamine/2301_1201_14:
Ah, that takes me back... Now that I’m done with
work for the day, perhaps I’ll go home and flip
through an old family photo album.
charaepi_ch0120_00_lusamine/2301_0401_16:
I was conducting research by observing various
sync pairs.
charaepi_ch0120_00_lusamine/2301_0302_17: What kind of work were you doing?
charaepi_ch0120_00_lusamine/2301_0402_18:
I was analyzing the data I gathered from
observing a variety of sync pairs.
charaepi_ch0120_00_lusamine/2301_1201_19: I’m especially focused on researching sync stones.
charaepi_ch0120_00_lusamine/2301_1201_20:
Sync stones amplify a sync pair’s strength in
proportion to the strength of their bond. I want to
better understand the mechanics of this process.
charaepi_ch0120_00_lusamine/2301_1201_21:
With that knowledge, the Aether Foundation would
make great strides toward its goal of ensuring the
protection and happiness of Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0120_00_lusamine/2301_1201_22:
Judging by the deep bond between you and your
partner Pokémon, it may also be worth researching
the two of you.
charaepi_ch0120_00_lusamine/2301_0401_24:
I see... I suppose battling is one way to research
other Trainers.
charaepi_ch0120_00_lusamine/2301_0302_25: I know a good way to do that!
charaepi_ch0120_00_lusamine/2301_0402_26:
I presume that glint in your eyes and smile on your
face mean you wish to have a Pokémon battle?
charaepi_ch0120_00_lusamine/2301_1201_27:
With your skill, you must certainly interest
Pheromosa as well.
charaepi_ch0120_00_lusamine/2301_1201_28:
Very well. I accept your challenge.
Go, Pheromosa!
charaepi_ch0120_00_lusamine/2301_1201_34: Ah, of course. I should have known.
charaepi_ch0120_00_lusamine/2301_1201_35:
Pheromosa refuses to touch anything, perhaps
because it senses some uncleanness in this world.
charaepi_ch0120_00_lusamine/2301_1201_37:
It may simply be reluctant to approach you after
seeing you covered in mud just moments ago.
charaepi_ch0120_00_lusamine/2301_0301_38: I’m sorry for getting so muddy...
charaepi_ch0120_00_lusamine/2301_0401_39:
No apology is necessary, but it’s certainly good to
get in the habit of cleaning yourself after doing
something that gets you dirty.
charaepi_ch0120_00_lusamine/2301_0402_41:
You would do that for Pheromosa?
Thank you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0120_00_lusamine/2301_1201_42:
We can have our Pokémon battle after you’ve
had a bath and gotten cleaned up.
charaepi_ch0120_00_lusamine/2301_1201_43:
Pheromosa came here through an Ultra Wormhole
from another world known as Ultra Space.
charaepi_ch0120_00_lusamine/2301_1201_44: We call such Pokémon Ultra Beasts.
charaepi_ch0120_00_lusamine/2301_1201_45:
There’s still much we don’t know about Ultra
Beasts, and some people view them as dangerous.
charaepi_ch0120_00_lusamine/2301_1201_46:
Personally, I think Pheromosa looks like a queen.
Wouldn’t you agree?
charaepi_ch0120_00_lusamine/2301_1201_47:
Perhaps it lived in a polished, shining castle in
that world.
charaepi_ch0120_00_lusamine/2301_1201_48:
When I imagine that, it’s hard for me to believe
Pheromosa is just a dangerous creature.
charaepi_ch0120_00_lusamine/2301_0401_50: Thank you. I’m glad we share the same opinion.
charaepi_ch0120_00_lusamine/2301_0402_52:
Well, who can say... But I do hope to understand
Pheromosa better by spending time with it.
charaepi_ch0120_00_lusamine/2301_1201_53: Why don’t you go and rest up for today?
charaepi_ch0120_00_lusamine/2301_1201_54:
We can have our battle some other time.
Pheromosa and I will be looking forward to it.
